message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,150,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1,100,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but the value of this product is truly significant.  I could meet you halfway between our offers. How about $1,125,000?
I understand the value of the product, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1,100,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer again?
